name: The Arcadia Of Wulin
summary: The Arcadia Of Wulin is a relaxed and casual individual independent game with the theme of construction and management. In the game, you will create a beautiful and prosperous paradise from nothing. Carefully plan each building, so that the building will have a sense of heaven and earth, so that the residents living here can comprehend the peerless martial arts. Here are the masters from outside the world, and here are the knights who return to hermit.
